output:
In my travels far away and many still to come
Things I miss from younger days can't be replaced
By things yet unknown, this long walk in the woods
I miss the breeze and the sounds, hideabows, gray red trees
I miss the leaves on the ground
The fresh smell of nothing and everything
The coldness of our hands unclothed, the laughter in our voices singing
The joy of feeling unconditional love
Stopping, staring at a stray deer in the shadows made
Where light can't get through all the things I miss from here
What I miss the most is holding hands with you
